title: Pixel 2 shutdown while using camera on low battery and battery save mode.
content:
Hello community,

My Pixel 2 will shutdown if specific conditions were match.
1. Low battery (lower than about 40%)
2. Battery save mode is on
3. Using camera; actually it happens when I click the shutter. 
Regardless of whether you use the camera through the original camera application or was called by a third party, the crashing performance can be reproduced stably.
